title: How did slavery supporters respond to the arguments of Frederick Douglass? - Quora

response.answer_text: I do know that some thought him a fraud.,.,.a sham.,.,. that the words he spoke were not his and the story of his life was a lie, Of course none of that was true but Douglas forced them to stare at their own hypocrisy.
After the civil war they said, “heck yeah, we are now the democratic party. Join us so we can use you as a prop in all our campaigns".
